General.Name: Eastern Platinum Limited
General.Description: Eastern Platinum Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the mining, exploration, and development of platinum group metal (PGM) and chrome properties in South Africa. Its PGM deposits include platinum, palladium, rhodium, osmium, iridium, and ruthenium. The company principally holds 100% interest in the Crocodile River Mine located on the western limb and the Kennedy's Vale project on the eastern limb of Bushveld Complex (BCX); and the Mareesburg project situated on the eastern limb of the BCX. It also holds 97.7% interest in the Spitzkop project located on the eastern limb of the BCX. Eastern Platinum Limited was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1080-1188 West Georgia Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 4A2
